articles.title: Samsung Galaxy AI to be available across 100 million Galaxy devices this year - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: It will be free to use until 2025. The Samsung Galaxy S24 series unveiled over a week ago comes with Galaxy AI - the Korean brand's generative AI service...
articles.content: The Samsung Galaxy S24 series unveiled over a week ago comes with Galaxy AI - the Korean brand's generative AI service powered by Google Cloud. Samsung already confirmed Galaxy AI will come to older … [+925 chars]
